sense.def: Etiological Agent. of tan 痰 , phlegm, that may cause disease. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 6: 令目眩頭旋，心 腹痞滿，常欲嘔吐，不思飲食，皆由痰毒壅滯也 , “The reason for dizziness and a spinning head, an obstacle-illness and a feeling of fullness in the heart and abdomen, a permanent urge to vomit, and a lack of appetite and thirst, is always phlegm poison obstruction and [qi] sluggishness”.
